attributes.action: Stop the importation of dogs with cropped ears.
attributes.additional_details: Cropping the ears of dogs is cruel and unnecessary causing unnecessary pain for no other reason than cosmetic.
attributes.background: I want the government to pass a law prohibiting the importation of all dogs with cropped ears.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333456
